tossup_question: -   –  Jora models a series of 28 six-sided dice rolls as a binomial distribution based on whether a roll is 6 or not. If she repeated this series of dice rolls multiple times, what is the average number of times that the dice will land on six?
tossup_answer: ANSWER: 14/3  ACCEPT: FOUR AND TWO THIRDS
bonus_question: -   –  Given the three vectors, a = 2i + j, b = -i + 3j + 4k, and c = -2j + k, find a dot open parenthesis 2b + 4c close parenthesis.
